糊口.definition: to scrape a meager living; to get by with difficulty

糊名.definition: (old) to seal an examinee's name on the examination paper to prevent fraud

糊嘴.definition: to scrape a meager living; to get by with difficulty

糊塗賬.definition: muddled accounts; a mess of bookkeeping

糊弄.definition: to fool; to deceive; to go through the motions

糊糊.definition: viscous; gooey; sticky; indistinct; thick congee; porridge

糊裡糊塗.definition: confused; vague; indistinct; muddle-headed; mixed up; in a daze

糊里糊塗.definition: variant of 糊裡糊塗|糊里糊涂[hu2 li5 hu2 tu2]
